title: Ranked issue
body: Heyy guys i was wondering if anyone knows whats going on. I have entered my promos games with 2 of my mates, i had a free one, we lost one and so i decided to solo the last game, i won the last game but when we finnished i wasn't promoted and instead gained lp. Does anyone know whats wrong?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Human Ryze,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=2hMqEcrs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-01T03:11:58.078+0000)
>
> Sounds like you got rekt :)

But most likely you just dodged a queue or didn't lock in and that gives you an automatic loss.
